name: Multiplayer Words
description:
Multiplayer Words

Have you every wanted to play Scrabble or Words with Friends during the work day? Are you wondering why the "Tile" component is the number one most inserted Component in your Organization's Design System Analytics report? Multiplayer Words is the answer!


How to play

  • Install the Game Table plugin by @karl and start playing with your friends!
  • Choose from three different board designs, and several other tile designs.
  • Use Game Table to Shuffle tiles. If tiles are scattered, you'll also want to Tidy Up.
  • Draw tiles from the pile.
  • You can look at them using Look Privately to start planning your moves.
  • Ready to make a play? Flip Over will turn the tile up for everyone else to see.
  • Drag and drop the tiles onto the board
  • Update your score in the score keeper


Change Log

June 23rd:

  • Increased initial number of score entries to 24 to better accommodate two player games.
  • Add duplicates (⌘D) the "scoreList" component on the Components page to increase further if needed.
